title: Can not open League of Legends
body: Hello, I tried opening League of Legends to play with my friends this afternoon an I got this http://prntscr.com/cbguah . Hopefully someone from the League community or Riot members can help me. Before this happened all i did was restart my computer because I was getting lag. That i all that could of happened because I played a round of League right before that.

replies.body:
Patcher Kernel errors are typically a direct result of Leauge not having the proper permissions to run correctly. In order to ensure it does, I recommend taking a poke at some of the steps inside our [permissions guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

Let me know if that resolved this for you.
